title: SOLD - HOF Broadcaster PCs including '51 Scully/Barber & '69 Buck/Caray
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD - HOF Broadcaster PCs including '51 Scully/Barber & '69 Buck/Caray
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following postcards of Ford C. Frick Award winners.  Most are extremely rare and each one contains the earliest known image on cardboard for the respective broadcaster.

Up first is the earliest known card of broadcasting icon Vin Scully.  This oversized postcard also features Red Barber, the first Ford C. Frick Award winner.  The back appears to have been sent/signed by "Red".  Who knew there was a Cal Abrams fan club?

1951 Dodgers Broadcasters PC - asking $SALE PENDING
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/almosthofcollection/websize/1951%20Scully1.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/1951%20Scully%20_back_3.jpg[/IMG]

Next up is another oversized PC, this time with the earliest known image of Jack Buck on cardboard.  The card also has long-time Chicago Cubs announcer (and Ford C. Frick Award winner) Harry Caray.

1969 KMOX Radio Oversized PC - 11"x7" - asking $SALE PENDING
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/almosthofcollection/websize/1969%20Buck_Caray.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/1969%20Buck_Caray%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

Next up is a 1950's-60's PC (Kodak back) of Ernie Harwell.  I believe the autograph to be legit.  Asking $SOLD
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/almosthofcollection/websize/1950%20Harwell1.jpg[/IMG]

Last up is a 1970 Atlanta Braves Team Issue Photo (PC size) of Milo Hamilton in VG (off-center) condition.  Asking [S]$15[/S] $12

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/1970%20Hamilton.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/1970%20Hamilton%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

The first to PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it" for any will be glad they did.  Paypal f/f is preferred method of payment.  Shipping is on me.

Thanks for looking!  Derek

bump for final price reduction before heading to eBay.

Thanks for looking!
I will take them both--email sent
